property.name: labelStyle
property.default: font-size: 22px; color: #036; line-height: 1.0; font-stretch: 150%!important; font-weight: 900!important; margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 20px; font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;

property.name: labelStyle
property.default: font-size: 30px; color: #036; line-height: 1.0; font-stretch: 150%!important; font-weight: 900!important; margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 20px; font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;
